requestGoodAnswer.count: select count(distinct ?nameMovie) where { ?movie rdf:type <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/Film>. ?movie <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/starring> ?randomActorApp. ?movie rdfs:label ?nameMovie. FILTER(LANGMATCHES(LANG(?nameMovie), 'en')) }
requestGoodAnswer.result: select distinct ?nameMovie ?nameActor where { ?movie rdf:type <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/Film>. ?movie <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/starring> ?randomActorApp. ?movie rdfs:label ?nameMovie. ?randomActorApp rdfs:label ?nameActor. FILTER(LANGMATCHES(LANG(?nameActor), 'en') && LANGMATCHES(LANG(?nameMovie), 'en')) }

requestBadAnswer.count: select count(distinct ?nameMovie) where { ?randomMovieApp rdf:type <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/Film>. ?randomMovieApp <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/starring> ?randomActorApp. ?randomMovieApp rdfs:label ?nameMovie. FILTER(LANGMATCHES(LANG(?nameMovie), 'en')) }
requestBadAnswer.result: select distinct ?nameMovie where { ?randomMovieApp rdf:type <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/Film>. ?randomMovieApp <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/starring> ?randomActorApp. ?randomMovieApp rdfs:label ?nameMovie. FILTER(LANGMATCHES(LANG(?nameMovie), 'en')) }
